title.rendered: Prince William and Kate Middleton Wedding to Be Broadcast in 3D?!?

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

It’s possible this 3D thing is getting out of hand. Royally out of hand, we should say.

Following in the overpriced, extraneous footsteps of every other movie produced in Hollywood these days, British networks are reportedly considering airing the Kate Middleton and Prince William nuptials in 3D.

“That is obviously of some interest, but our responsibility is to bring things everybody can see on air and 3D has a very limited footprint,” one BBC executive said.

A solution could be to pipe the 3D broadcasts into certain public places, such as pubs and movie theaters.

Whatever. As log as this Snoop Dogg song is involved in some capacity, we’ll tune in.
